alert.note: Alert for Pamlico; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued April 07 at 6:02PM EDT until April 10 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Up to 2 to 4 feet of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the Pamlico Sound, Trent, Bay and lower Neuse Rivers, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions will continue to deteriorate through Saturday with greatest impacts expected Saturday night and Sunday.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
